Headline: #94 California, #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Homan and Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California and 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California and #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage near Homan and Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #63/63rd Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Kedzie
ShortDescription: Westbound 63/63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, 59th, Pulaski and 63rd due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63/63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, 59th, Pulaski and 63rd due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Cumberland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Cumberland. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
